content: readme.md gotypist simple touch-typing tutor follows steve yegge's methodology going fast, slow, medium cycles. tl;dr this methodology is you three passes each phrase.fast - type fast you without attention proper technique correctnessslow - proper technique all costs, as slow needed achieve normal - type target speed, try make mistakesgotypist score each pass accordingly: errors not matter the pass, speed does matter the second pass, both matter the final pass. check score. for details ( are subject change). project is mainly motivated trying termbox-, but is definitely ready productive learning.installationgit clone https://github.com/pb-/gotypist.git "$gopath/src/github.com/pb-/gotypist"cd "$gopath/src/github.com/pb-/gotypist" dep buildusagegotypist [-w file] [-s] [word]...-w file this file word list instead /usr/share/dict/words-s run demo mode take screenshotword... explicitly specify phrasekey bindingsesc quitc-f skip forward the next phrasec-r toggle repeat phrase modec- toggle finger usage hints
